resources.string: Help those affected by the COVID-19 pandemic by donating through the platform pmcares.gov.in
The artificial intelligence system that Prixa.ai provides will detect covid-19 symptoms that you may experience.
If you feel sick with covid-19 symptoms, immediately contact emergency services to be treated immediately.
Give your hand to those affected by this pandemic
Follow the steps according to instructions
UI Design by simantOo for Nickelfox (free use)
Illustrated image design by freepik.com (free use)
Health tests with artificial intelligence by prixa.ai
Animation of medical officers by Paulo Bañas from lottiefiles.com

This application is not intended for anyone who makes this application as a benchmark against covid-19 information although all information in this application is downloaded from the unofficial covid-19 website India (covid19india.org). But this application is intended for software developer activists to explore its potential in developing an application which in this case is intended for a personal portfolio. If the user feels disadvantaged when using this application, all full responsibility is left to the user. But if the user feels benefited, it is possible that the user can provide positive feedback on I personally through the contact provided. Mumbai, 2020

With social distancing, the risk of contracting COVID-19 from others will be reduced. Conversely, if you turn out infected but not aware of it, so keeping away from the crowd will really help prevent the spread. \ n \ n So, if someone infected with this virus then accidentally coughs or sneezes without closing his mouth, then the droplet will fall on a nearby surface. When there are other people who are not infected holding the surface, then touches the mouth, nose or eyes without washing hands first, so he is at risk high infected. \ n \ nThis is what makes the transmission of this disease rise dramatically in a short time. Many people who are not aware that they are infected, then go to various locations to meet friends and relatives. As a result, the spread of this virus is increasingly widespread.

The World Health Organization (WHO) recommends that everyone always wash their hands in order to prevent the spread of the COVID-19 corona virus. Clean your hands regularly and thoroughly with soap and water or alcohol-based liquids. \ n \ nWash your hands with soap and water or use cleaning fluid alcohol-based can kill viruses that may be in your hands. Washing hands can get you stay healthy and prevent the spread of respiratory infections and diarrhea from one person to another. \ n \ nGerms can spread from other people or surfaces when you: \ n1. Touch your eyes, nose, and mouth with hands not washed. \ n2. Eat or prepare food and drinks with your hands not washed. \ N3. Touch the surface or contaminated object. \ n4. Flinches, coughs, or sneezes on the hands and then touches the hands other people or objects.

Research from the University of Hong Kong and the University of Maryland found that masks simple blocking 100 percent of droplets and aerosols. The Guardian writes, countries that are has required the use of masks from the beginning to show a lower mortality rate than countries that don\'t enforce it. \ n \ nHowever, the big challenge is using masks only will work if most people use it. Analysis from the Food and Drug Administration (FDA) about the flu estimates, if 50 percent of the population uses masks, transmission of the virus can be reduced by half. Meanwhile, if 80 percent of the population uses masks, the virus can be lost. \ N \ nBecause that, various regions are currently adopting laws that require the use of masks in crowded places such as public transportation and shops.
